title: Fugitive speedboat killer arrested
content: The man dubbed the speedboat killer, Jack Shepherd, has been arrested in Georgia after months on the run. Shepherd had been due to stand trial last year at the Old Bailey over the death of 24-year-old Charlotte Brown in December 2015, but was convicted in his absence of manslaughter by gross negligence. Today he finally handed himself in to Georgian police.
author: Keme Nzerem
